data.title: Parks
data.meta_description: Welcome to City of Oak Park, MI
data.text:
Park Hours:

Sunday through Saturday, 6:00am to 10:00pm

Best Park

Location: 24300 block of Roanoke Ave. The parking entrance is between Colgate and Yale. Best Park is behind JFK Elementary School.

Size: 3.7 acres

Facilities:

2 swing sets

1 tee ball

1 basketball court with bleachers

2 tennis courts

School Facilities:

2 swing sets

Large play structure

Dewey Park

Location: 21600 block of Stratford St. The location is near the end of the street. It is located on the south side of the Oak Park Academy.

Size: 6.7 acres

Facilities:

1 swing set

1 play structure

1 ball field

4 half court basketball courts

1 kids basketball court

School Facilities:

Monkey bars

Harding Park

Location: 26400 block of Harding St. Harding Park is at the far north end of Harding St., just north of Talbot where the street dead ends.

Size: 2.0 acres

Facilities:

2 buck about riders

2 play structures

3 swings

1 twirly

Jackson Park

Location: 23400 block of Rosewood Ave., adjacent to Jackson Middle School. There are two entrances; one on Oak Park Blvd. between Majestic and Rosewood. and the second on Rosewood Ave. between Oak Park Blvd. and Kenwood.

Size: 5.3 acres

Facilities:

1 baseball field w/ bleachers

School Facilities:

1 monkey bars small play structure

1 slide

2 Swing Sets

Key Park

Location: 23200 block of Scotia

Size: 6.1 acres

Facilities:

1 baseball field with bleachers

School Facilities:

2 soccer goals

Lessenger Park

Location: 14501 block of Talbot

Size: 7.3 acres

Facilities:

1 baseball field with bleachers

School Facilities:

1 play structure

1 basketball court

Picnic area

2 soccer goals

Rothstein Park

Location: 25308 block of Church Street

Size: 7.2 acres

Facilities:

1 Play structure

Vita course

Lighted paved path

Plenty of seating

Wheelchair accessible concert stage

Shepherd Park

Location: 24198 block of Church Street

Size: 56.8 acres

Facilities:

Grills with tables

3 pavilions

Wooden train

2 play structures

1 swing set

1 wooden truck

3 play tunnels

4 play tires

Indoor ice arena

2 basketball courts

2 lighted baseball courts with scoreboards

7 tennis courts

2 practice walls

Nature path

Walking trail

Hill with sledding

Indoor restrooms

Outdoor pool

Tyler Park

Location: 14450 block of Manhattan Street

Size: 3.7 acres

Facilities:

1 swing set

1 baseball field with bleachers

2 soccer goals

1 hill for sledding

School Facilities:

2 swing sets

1 large play structure

Victoria Park

Location: 25308 block of Church St.

Size: 3.7 acres

Facilities:

2 swing sets

1 tee ball

1 bleachers

1 basketball court

2 tennis courts

School Facilities:

2 swing sets

Large play structure
